title.rendered: Pretoria vs Paarl, South Africa T20 League 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Pretoria: Philip Salt/Will Jacks, Kusal Mendis (wk), Theunis de Bruyn (c), Rilee Rossouw, Colin Ingram, James Neesham, Senuran Muthusamy, Migael Pretorius/Wayne Parnell, Eathan Bosch, Daryn Dupavillon/Anrich Nortje, Joshua Little

Paarl: Jason Roy, Jos Buttler (wk), Wihan Lubbe, Mitchell Van Buuren, Andile Phehlukwayo, David Miller (c), Dane Vilas, Evan Jones, Bjorn Fortuin, Lungi Ngidi, Tabraiz Shamsi

Pitch Report

Venue: SuperSport Park, Centurion

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 178

2nd innings average score: 165

Wickets per innings: 8

Type: Balanced

Wins

Batting 1st: 33%

Batting 2nd: 67%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Will Jacks’ scores at the venue this season read 92 and 34. Overall, he has hammered 270 runs with a strike rate of 201 – the most for his side.

For Paarl, Jos Buttler has been the star batter. He has generated 30-run and 50-run bonus thrice each.

Three pacers in this contest have an Ultimate Team percentage of 80 in the last 5 games: Anrich Nortje (11 wickets), Lungi Ngidi (9 wickets), and Ethan Bosch (6 wickets and a top score of 23).

In the first encounter between these franchises, Theunis de Bruyn (53 off 47) and Kusal Mendis (37 off 26 and a catch) were the captain and vice-captain of the Ultimate Team respectively.

Bjorn Fortuin, along with his consistent wicket-taking, has provided bonus points for economy in 4 games. Overall, he has collected 13 wickets with an economy of 6.2 RPO.

All 3 fifties and a hundred in the last 3 games at the venue came from the top 3 batters. The middle order has not had much success, so much so that 29 of 47 wickets fell between overs 7 and 16.
